title: Couture Embroidery Sample, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: wool, imitation pearls, coral beads, gold beads, gold thread
Technique: embroidered on plain weave
description: White wool with a square of embroidery showing a flowering plant growing out of a vase with brass on either side surrounded by a vine and a straight border worked in coral, imitation pearls, gilt beads and thread.

tombstone.epitaph:
Couture Embroidery Sample, early 20th century.
early 20th century. Medium: wool, imitation pearls, coral beads, gold beads, gold thread
Technique: embroidered on plain weave. Gift of S.L. Klein. 1941-23-2.
